description:
Maybe there is a teacher in everyone’s heart.She looks so weak that a strong wind may blow her away. She is not too tall, about 150cm.Her English name is Amy. She is experienced of English teaching. She teaches me for three years.
   She is special. Said she give us first on the first lesson, she gave us the first class and is not the same as other teachers. She says the first few minutes of discipline, and then, gave some learn the words and sentence patterns of fifth grade we review it again, let's learn the new knowledge would not be so unfamiliar, not like other teachers, the first class is a class discipline.She always shows English songs to us before her class. A few days later, she will ask us to follow the singing on the tape. I can still remember some songs she taught us. It is strange that she looks so weak, but no one in my class will against her word. I think maybe is because her own personality.Everyone respects her. She is serious in work, so that our whole class’s English is good. Happily, she is our friend after class. She always plays badminton  with us. She is also ready to help us if we have any difficulity. In my mind, a good teacher is more than a million books.
   After few weeks,she said she taught us to recite words. She said, remembering words actually isn't difficult at all, as long as you are willing to remember. I still clearly remember she taught us one way: a word. On the first day you come to see it, and then take a look at the third day, a week, and then a month and have a look at the last three months and look at it, you will never forget the word, Sue the teacher taught us to home reading, are the teacher told us to read before 15 ~ 30 minutes, and Sue the teacher told us to read only five minutes. She said, reading too long throat is uncomfortable, read 5 minutes a day is enough, I tried it back, throat really much more comfortable than before, and five minutes to read also remember more firmly than ever.
   This is our English teacher, is a special teacher,I would say thank you in my heart because you teach me a lot.
   My teacher, I love you.
